channel.title: How do i make objects admin only
channel.description: i have looked but i cant seem to find a tut on how to make items admin only

item.title: How do i make objects admin only
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(variable == item ID) && (playerRights < 2) { sendMessage("Only administrators can wield this item!"); return; }

item.title: How do i make objects admin only
item.dc:creator: @cj_own_u cj own u
item.description:
@cj_own_u wrote:

if that ah… doesn’t work you can also do this.

open up client.java
add into it somewhere

        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 && playerRights <(possibly space; not sure)2)
        {
            remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
        }

this won’t destroy item, but it will remove it, i think.
ps. don’t right possibly space, just there might be a space.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make objects admin only
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Add this is your server’s public void run

if(playerHasItem(ItemID, ItemAmount) && (playerRights < 1)){ deleteItem(ItemID, ItemAmount); }
I think I got the < > mixed up so if that don’t work swap it.

Read full topic
